name: Xiongshou
description:
"Run throught the night, teleport, kill and shoot shurikens to visit your old temple that is now surronded by enemies. But remember you're a ninja, the light is your biggest weakness."

Controls:

  • WASD - Move character
  • Mouse Leftclick - Melee kill (only backstab)
  • Mouse Rightclick - Throw shurikens (stuns enemy)
  • E - Teleport
  • Q - Hide behind bushes

I know a lot of the mechanics need aprovement, but I actually enjoyed the gameplay and wanted to share :)
Game made in 1 week.
